info.name: No Whitespace! for Google Plus
info.description: Tweaks for the New Google+ Design.
info.additionalInfo:
This style plugin gets rid of the useless Trending Topics and People You May Know column,
creating more room for the Google+ content you care about.

Changelog:

- Removed some extraneous crap from the Google Bar

- Removed YouTube cross-marketing crap

- Fixed the width of the sharing bar when active

- Fixed profile pages

- Improved comment text legibility

- Fixed inline YouTube videos

- Updated page rules

- Fixed preview images

- Fixed chat width

- Fixed some missing text links

- Fixed profile banners

April 25:

- Re-hacked some new Google+ homepage feed updates. The idiots decided to specify image widths with inline style tags instead of CSS, so I had to use an attribute selector.

- Fixed profile pages a little bit
